i got it!!!!!!!

There is one thing in the instructions that you didnt tell us to do...
You say 3.: "double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and start with..." I just happened to click on the toed registry icon after clicking the makedesktop icon and added the registry. The "install" changed to play.

Now i can play this great game

look...
double click: Cjack-start.exe ( must be done )
this adds the correct regfile, YOU just answer with yes after exit from here (with esc btw)

double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and start with.
this makes a desktop icon to the game launcher .exe file... ( NOW displaying "play" instead "install")
